summary: This document is an internal email forwarding a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein from a foreign source. The email indicates the agency's practice of logging such submissions but not responding to foreign senders, and it instructs the recipient to note it in the log.

events.title: Civilian Crime Report Submission Forwarded
events.description: An internal email forwards a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein from a foreign source, with instructions to log it.

keyFacts: A civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein was received from a foreign country.
The agency's practice is to log such submissions but not respond to senders in foreign countries.
The email instructs the recipient to make a note in the log regarding the submission.
